RIP off, I originally downloaded the free version of lost lands the dark overlords, and paid Â£1.79 or there abouts for the bonus game, I thought I had only download part of the game with it being free, so I looked at the preview video and it looked like thre was different puzzle so I purchased the full game at Â£5.99, the game is the same so I've paid for a game that I originally got for free and got it far cheaper eith just paying for the bonus. I'm so mad this is ripping people off. Fuming

Love this series. Play the series (6 games, so far). It's worth the cost. I'm about to re-run the series. I will say that this one is a bit disconnected from the other 5 parts. The only thing this one has in common with the other three is Susan (main character) and The Lost Lands (world she goes to). That said it's still a great story and a fun game. This is one of my favorites.
love this game would recomend to anyone who likes good stories and puzzles

content: one of the BEST series out there !!! it's a little choppy, but worth the play! the $7.00 price is WAY to high for my budget, $4.00 would be better, I realize that it's your job and you need to be paid, but you have a world market and many games

Another fantastic game from Five-BN. My only gripe is that the little bits and pieces in each hidden object puzzle are very small, making it difficult to see exactly what I'm clicking on (and I've got a big phone). But the puzzles themselves are solid, and the size issue seems to have been fixed in their more recent games. Overall, it's as terrific a game as you'd expect from this company. (Great bonus game, too.)

BEST GAME SINCE ENIGMATIS!!!! This game has all the features of a great game, from the graphic quality to the sound and voiceovers. I enjoyed it from start to finish. I had been looking for a game similar to the Enigmatis series and can honestly say that I was not the least it disappointed in finding this gem. I think it might even be better actually. The quests were entertaining, the puzzles and HOG scenes were unique and the quality of the graphics were absolutely amazing. This game was definitely worth the money I paid for it and whats even better is I can go back and replay for higher achievements.  The developers should be very proud of their work on this game! Well done!!!
Loved it great entertaiment without frustration beautiful graphics

As previously mentioned my second game from this developer and again I was in for a treat.no problem with anything great game thanks

Spoiler alert... Dark Overlord should read Golden Overlord... just sayin... This is the first of four titles with the same name, so it should be good, right? Actually, yes and mostly yes! Lost Lands 1 is a four star game that doesn't quite make it to five stars. Once again, our cute flyer is underused, collectible items (hard to spot on mobile) a waste of time and most mini-games are too hard. Achievements are not linked to Google Play, so they are pointless too. But, the rest is all good and should keep you busy for upwards of ten hours. Not as scary as it pretends to be though...
Very great overall game. Surprised with the good storyline, great graphics and game play that more haven't downloaded it. A definite must for adventure game enthusiasts or first timers.
Long and really great

Lost Lands: Dark Overlord - Wow! I purchased and played Lost Lands 2, 3 and 4 but never played the first one. I love this series. Beautiful graphics, neat voice-overs, collectibles, map, different puzzles, mini-games and HO's. This game is very long and well worth the money. I played over several days. I really got a kick from the "stone man" talking. I couldn't stop watching his eyebrows. :)  GREAT JOB FIVE-BN!!!

Another favorite on my list!  Long game play even the bonus chapter.  WOW! Different location. Not boring.  Good Graphics design. No redundant hidden object scene. Variety of challenges.  Always something new and different to look forward to. Please make more games like this.

Meh. i wanted to like this much more than i actually liked it. Lovely graphics and audio, great production value. A couple things kept getting in my way, though, and caused me to quit prematurely: 1) UI design - the "map" button is a tiny little fleck in the very corner of the screen, right below the much larger "Hint" button, which leads to accidentally tapping Hint far too often while trying to tap the map. 2) several times i intentionally used the Hint button only to have it point out some part of a scene which was literally too dark to see. i.e. without the Hint button i was getting stuck at times because items i needed to interact with were in pitch-black parts of a scene.
Love this game, I just finished the second one as well and I have bought the third and fourth as well please make more!!!!
Really good storyline
Good game, interesting world and an okay story. The gameplay works well, except that you need to pick up a lot of odd items before having any idea what you'll be using them for. Good map.
Good
Dark Overlord
Keeps rebooting my LG tablet when I start the game???

I've just played this for the second time and it's such a great game. Lately I've not played one that was great so I decided to go and play older games and honestly this is above par. Music, graphics, detail, game play, the story are all just brilliant. The bonus chapter is like no other as you explore new areas that weren't in the main game. You actually see full "endings" rather than doing the last task and the credits appearing. If you love these types of games then please play this as it's fantastic.

Love this game. It's challenging, a little scary, fun, interactive and worth the money. I hear people say all to often, " I thought this was free, blah blah blah, " what those people  don't seem to understand is that it's free for you to try to see if you want to buy it. Me personally, I'd rather see if the graphics, story, and challenges are worth it BEFORE I buy it. That's why I love the FREE TRIALS. Keep them coming.

I almost feel hypocritical in saying this game is TOO long. I look past the vague story (that mother should be a lot more hurried and stressed for the story playing out), since most of this style of game struggles to connect features with a coherent, interesting ramble.  The amount of HOG areas were way too few for my taste, but the main reason for dropping a star was I just lost interest after a while and was merely using hint to trigger the show of the next location since the map was so damn big, and the pieces picked up were linking to sections I had forgotten even existed.
Love this game very entertaining and challenging especially on difficult level worth the buy
Very absorbig
Absolutely brilliant game,graphics are great,the game was quite a long one,it kept me entertained for hours
Not in the game but in the fact that is keeps either closing down or locking up on my android phone. Never had this problem with their other games.

It's a solid game, not outstanding. The HO puzzles are a nice variety. No bugs, standard features all seem to be present. ETA: The advertising on the game I paid for is annoying, and at the end of the game it had a 'you are done' message with the Share to Facebook option CHECKED by default! I DO NOT appreciate this, as I almost didn't notice it and feel like I was almost TRICKED into SPAMMING my friends! Don't harm my reputation! Removing another star, no longer recommend at all.
Great game at least it works
Excellent game play, good length and bonus to boot. Thank God for a decent map. If you can get past the mix of present time and fairy story land you will love it.
I'm really enjoying this game, puzzles Are fun to do and a great story.

Decent story, good balance of cut scenes, traveling, and a variety of puzzles. Great graphics. Would be nice to be able to track achievements from main menu, and in Google Play Games like the many other puzzle games I play. That's the only downside, but definitely a consideration when purchasing games. ***Edit: About halfway through the game, it started to spontaneously close and not save progress leading to some replay. Items glitch and aren't useable. Removed a star. Won't be purchasing another title.

Cut scene graphics are brilliant, a lot of work has gone into this game and playing it is certainly worth the price. I've paid more for worse games. The art work is wonderful. Its far more than just a hog wich is what drew me in along with the reviews and story line. If your thinking about buying the full  game do it. Never been a fan of hidden object games but this is far superior to any I've seen. Keep making games like this and I'll keep buying them!
It's a bit pricey compared to other games but it was so worth it. When I get some more money I will def buy 2 and 3.
Good graphics and story line.  Entertaining and the puzzles are not too difficult. Great for unwinding.

Im actually thoroughly enjoying the HOGS which usually never happens.  The makers made it a little different so its not the same boring repetitive old HOG. Lovin it so far. The map is incredible.  Even lets you know if u can find a hidden collectible which is like no other game ive played!!!! So this way when I finish the game,  I'll be able to have EVERYTHING completed for once lol. I loved this game. A bargain at the price! It's FAR FAR FAR more than simply a 'hidden object' game - even the 'hidden object' puzzles that exist have a story to them (Find X to do Y so you can find Z etc.) The logic puzzles, the scenery, the cut scenes, the realistic rendering (I loved watching my owl fly!), the atmosphere, music, brilliant  My only gripe is that there is no easy way to go back to an earlier stage in the game. (Fortunately my tablets are backed up twice a day, so I could easily rollback to where I was any previous day) Sometimes you do, or see something, and would like to 'rewind' and do it again. I guess what I mean, is that each user should be allowed to save their progress periodically into one of many 'save game slots'. Or at least let us jump back to any chapter we have done.  Apart from the small gripe, it's still a perfect 5 stars
Worth every penny
Good game love it.
Great mix of games and  puzzles. Very   interactive game play keeps one interested in the game.  Good length. Has bonus game, map and great hint button. Highly recommended.
I am really enjoying this game. Everything about it, the graphics, music and the story. Already bought the second one too. Great job.

Enjoying replay value of this Lost Land series (game 1& 2) as well as NY Mysteries.  Checklist: detailed graphix, performance/response, interactive map, decent bonus items, decent play time.  Update note to GooglePlay: why should I bother to post reviews when they continue to be censored/unposted.

The art work is lovely, the animation is stellar, there puzzles are fun, hidden object ares are well played, and the  sound and music are perfect. for the game. My only complaint is the story is a bit flat, not really much to it. Other than that I will play this one again, worth the $5.

This is my favorite game I have played so far, and I have played many. The graphics are unbelievable. They have search games, but there are so many different puzzles to solve. Well done. Will be playing the other games made by this company.

Beautiful game,  definitely worth the money to get the full version.   I wish it was longer but still it has a lot of content and is very easy to navigate.

Absolutely breathtaking. I own over 400 hogs and adventure games and this one is at the top of my list.  Beautiful artwork. The storyline,  although we've seen it before,  keeps you engaged the whole time. Despite what ppl are reporting the game hasn't crashed once. I love the interactive map. I've been playing non stop now for nearly 3 hours and I still have a ways to go. Awesome job devs.  Keep making games like this and I'll keep buying them.
I  love it !!! The music , the amazing Graphics, the story line!! Well done! !! Best game I have  played since Lost Souls 1 & 2 !!!

Another excellent game from five-BN. Really like your layouts, your graphics and gameplay. One minor point - could you put the map button not so near the hint button? Or any other for that matter. Very easy to press it by mistake. Many thanks. Looking forward to more games. Mx
I really enjoyed the game despite the annoyance of game crashing. The puzzles were quite good and story could improve. Nice graphics and details. Happy with interactive map.
Great game!! I'm  loving it! But I'm stuck, can't get the chest to open to get the last crystal! Can anyone help?
replyContent: We have fixed this bug. Please update your game to version 1.0.15.

content: Lovely graphics, long gameplay. Recommended.

Loved it, this is the sort of game I love to play. It did keep crashing which was annoying but I perservered and I really enjoyed the game. Being able to jump from one location to another using the map made the game really user friendly and the map options were fabulous. I liked that you could choose to have the map show where collectibles hadn't been found. The bonus chapter was excellent as well

I had two crashes, yes but the positive points outweigh this by far. Superb graphics, only a few and very clever hidden object scenes, tricky but fair puzzles, lots of things to find.... I could go on and on. Worth every penny!!!

I first gave this game 5 stars however after purchase I now have ads every half hour or so totally interupting my game and making me restart had the trial been like this I NEVER would have purchased I feel 5bn owes me money after all the ads I have been forced to view I thought I found a new fav. Adventure maker but the only part that is true is the ad part
replyContent: We have removed almost all advertisement from our HO games.
